participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, with a love for all things spooky.
participant_1.background: I own a hearse. I work in a craft store. I love to crochet. Halloween is my favorite holiday.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Passionate and dedicated to his art, with a cheerful disposition.
participant_2.background: I draw all the time and I am good at it. I listen to Pink when I am painting. It takes me an hour to drive to work in the morning. My wife makes the best pasta. As long as I have a cup of coffee in my hand I am a happy person.

content.text: I'm really interested in seeing your drawings. Do you have any online that I can see?
Yes, I do! Here's my Instagram: @thedrawingartist
Wow, these are amazing! I love your style.
Thank you! I'm glad you like them.
I'm also a big fan of Halloween. What are some of your favorite things to do for Halloween?
I love dressing up as different characters and going to parties. I also love carving pumpkins and watching horror movies.
Me too! I love watching horror movies with my friends.
I'm not sure I can pick just one favorite, but I love The Conjuring, The Shining, and The Exorcist.
Those are all great movies! I love The Conjuring too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to draw, listen to music, and spend time with my family.
I love to draw too! What kind of things do you draw?
I draw all kinds of things, but I mostly draw people and animals.
I love your drawings! I can tell you put a lot of time and effort into them.
Thank you! I'm glad you like them.
